title: disconnected from pvp.net?
body: this issue has been happening for a while for me ever since i got centurylink. I log in and play one game and i finish and seconds later i get disconnected from pvp.net. It is annoying when im in champ select and trying to queue. I get leaverbusters all the time for it. please help

replies.body:
Disconnections from PvP.net are widely caused by incompatible network settings or issues along your route that cause your connection to drop from the server. Working through the steps outlined in our [troubleshooting connections guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a great place to start in resolving this.

Let me know how those steps changed your issue.
There's a repair thing on log in screen for game try that.
